title: 7462 Artwork
content:
[[module Rate]]
[[=]]
This is a commission piece for [[*user FlyPurgatorio]], for their [[[SCP-7462]]].
[[/=]]
------

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/nTETg33.png]]
[[=]]
This has been great to work on, and I'm glad to be getting more comfortable with digital art. 
I definitely need to learn how to shade in digital properly, though.
